title: Prawn and courgette risotto
ingredients: ['1L fish stock', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '2 medium courgettes, thinly slices', '300g rice for risotto (Arborio)', '120ml white wine', '500g fresh prawns, shelled, de-veined and roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
